#summary This Wiki has a little information about the SED_ED SED-ML editor.

= Introduction =

The SED-ED editor is an application and Eclipse plugin for viewing and editing [http://sedml.org SED-ML]  level 1 version 1 files. 


= Details =

The features of the editor will be:

  * Show a graphical view of SEDML components, including autolayout
  * Allow editing and validation of fields.
  * Assistance with generation of XPath expressions for targetting XML models
  * Create SEDML file from scratch, or edit an existing file, or SEDX archive.

These are currently under development but initial alpha release expected June 2011.
